label: insider_threat_05_dx_network_forensics_003
content:
## 2024-09-04 Daily Operations Summary

### Netflow Stats
- Total flows: 13372310
- Unique source IPs: 1621
- Unique destination IPs: 3080
- Average flow duration (sec): 44.3
- Top protocol TCP percentage: 81.3
- Top protocol UDP percentage: 11.5
- ICMP percentage: 1.9
- Long lived flows greater than 1 hour: 191
- East-West traffic percentage: 63.2

### Dns Query Analysis
- Total queries: 3652481
- Unique domains: 74083
- NXDOMAIN responses: 9798
- DGA suspected domains: 4
- DNS over HTTPS queries: 2673
- Average response time (ms): 4.5
- Cache hit percentage: 85.8
- TXT record queries: 212
- PTR queries: 6943

### Ids Ips Hits

- Severity low: 206

  - ET WEB_SERVER SQL Injection Attempt
  - ET EXPLOIT Apache Log4j RCE Attempt
- False positive rate percentage: 8.4

### Events
- IDS signature ET SCAN tuned: threshold adjusted
- CT log alert: new certificate for api.company.com issued by Lets Encrypt — verified as authorized
- NetFlow anomaly: high volume from 10.26.4.15 — under review

### Notes
- Network monitoring daily report 2024-09-04. 13372310 flows analyzed. 3652481 DNS queries. 737 IDS alerts (2 critical, 12 high). WAN avg 2.93/1.82 Gbps in/out. 0 BGP announcements.
